roleset.name: cause stress in

role.descr: instrument of bothering (if in addition to arg0)

example.name: bother-v: just transitive
example.text: This has n't much bothered the UNESCO delegates , who last week could n't even agree to raise funds by selling off a fancy 19th - century French chateau the agency somehow owns .

propbank.arg: the UNESCO delegates , who last week could n't even agree to raise funds by selling off a fancy 19th - century French chateau the agency somehow owns

example.name: bother-v: adequate instrumental ex
example.text: And if a user is busy , `` he can set it for crisis mode : ` Do n't bother me with reports until Monday . '' '

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: I wish those people who are bothering you would add castration to their circumcision .

example.name: bothered-j
example.text: And when using the idea that Islam ' inspires terrorism ' , if we were honestly that bothered about such wrong - doing in the world , then we would surely be more concerned with ending the much more severe crisis 's and wrong - doing 's such as starvation and war .

propbank.arg: about such wrong - doing in the world

roleset.note: BOTHER-V NOTES: Based on WSJ, automatic expansion via verbnet; adjectival 'bothered' based on BOLT-4,5. Member of Vncls amuse-31.1, pain-40.8.1. (from bother.01-v)
BOTHERSOME-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SHARP-SRED. (from bothersome.01-j)
BOTHERED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from bothered.01-j)
Save instrument for cases where there's also a clear agent. (from bother.01-v)

roleset.name: semi-modal

example.name: bother-v: full clause action
example.text: There is no sign that you bothered to consider the inverse of your logic : namely , that mental illness and substance abuse might be to some degree consequences rather than causes of homelessness .

propbank.arg: to consider the inverse of your logic : namely , that mental illness and substance abuse might be to some degree consequences rather than causes of homelessness

example.name: bother-v: action as ing-clause
example.text: But skeptics ask why you should bother buying this stuff when you can get only slightly lower yields on government - guaranteed paper .

propbank.arg: when you can get only slightly lower yields on government - guaranteed paper

example.name: bother-v: action as PP
example.text: `` Why should I bother with something that 's an unknown for a very small pickup in yield ? '' he said .

propbank.arg: for a very small pickup in yield

example.name: bother-v: no action at all
example.text: I thought and , I 'm sure , others did : `` You should n't have bothered . ''

example.name: bothered-j
example.text: As for the Dr. Sun and China after the Revolution , I will not be bothered to talk about it . It is not something that small text can discuss either .

propbank.arg: As for the Dr. Sun and China after the Revolution

roleset.note: BOTHER-V NOTES: No appropriate VNcls (although arg0 is similar to that in marvel-31.3-2). Adjectival 'bothered' found in BOLT-7. (from bother.02-v)
BOTHERED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from bothered.02-j)
